titles.title: A bill to provide that in the case of leases to local education agencies and elementary and secondary schools, consideration may be at or below fair market value or for no consideration.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 11/18/2014--Introduced. Authorizes the Department of Defense (DOD) to lease non-excess military property to local educational agencies or elementary or secondary schools at or below fair market value or for no consideration.
